docs.snippet: Although Tanner Pearson claims he never played baseball growing up in Canada, he fooled his fellow Los Angeles Kings with a home run swing on the decisive goal against Carolina....
docs.lead_paragraph: Although Tanner Pearson claims he never played baseball growing up in Canada, he fooled his fellow Los Angeles Kings with a home run swing on the decisive goal against Carolina.

headline.main: LA Kings Hold Off Carolina 3-2 for 10th Home Win
headline.print_headline: LA Kings Hold Off Carolina 3-2 for 10th Home Win

docs.snippet: In the months since Mayor Bill de Blasio took office, he and Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan have forged a useful relationship blessed by good timing and apparent affection....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the months since Mayor Bill de Blasio took office, he and Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan have forged a useful relationship blessed by good timing and apparent affection.
docs.abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and Cardinal Timothy Dolan, Roman Catholic archbishop of New York, have cultivated a warm and mutually beneficial relationship during de Blasio's first year in office.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio and Cardinal Dolan: Beyond the Church-State Separation
